description:
Have you ever struggled to figure out the differences between apply, map, and applymap? In this video, I'll explain when you should use each of these methods and demonstrate a few common use cases. Watch the end of the video for three important announcements!

This is video 30 of 30 in the series, `Easier data analysis in Python with pandas <http://www.dataschool.io/easier-data-analysis-with-pandas/>`__. The notebook and datasets shown in the video are available on `GitHub <https://github.com/justmarkham/pandas-videos>`__.
title: How do I apply a function to a pandas Series or DataFrame?
